lead_paragraph: Senator Ted Cruz of Texas calling out Donald Trump for the apparent high crime of “embodying New York values” presents us with the politics of hypocrisy.

byline.contributor: Susan C. Beachy and Kitty Bennett contributed research.

headline.print_headline: Cruz’s Jab at Trump, and the Politics of Hypocrisy
headline.main: Ted Cruz and Donald Trump’s Familiar Feud Over New York

snippet: Senator Ted Cruz of Texas calling out Donald Trump for the apparent high crime of “embodying New York values” presents us with the politics of hypocrisy.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column underscores Sen Ted Cruz's hypocrisy during latest Republican presidential primary debate for criticizing so-called New York values; notes what is most galling about statement is that Cruz also claimed Donald J Trump embodies New York values, when fact is only thing Trump values is himself.
